message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $12,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
